name: Massive Ego- I Idolize You t-shirt (Ladies)
description: 100% Cotton Fruit Of The Loom (Lady Fit) T-shirt handmade with traditional Lino-print methods. 2 colour black/red print on white combed cotton t-shirt. Wearable Art. Front design features 'Mickey Massive' motif & Massive Ego logo. Back design features 'I Idolize You' text. Delivered gift wrapped (wrapping may vary) with FREE copy of the 'I Idolize You' CD single included. Hand wash or a cool wash is recommended to prolong the life of the print design. Do not tumble dry. Lightly iron design and text. Design and text will fade over time. T-Shirt info: Feminine fit with shaped side seams Cotton/Lycrarib crew neck with taped neckline 100% cotton, Belcoroyarn 160-165g/m² T-shirts are hand made to order so please allow 7-14 days for delivery. This is not a mass produced screen printed T shirt, each item is individually handmade taking 2.5 hours to produce, using traditional printing methods, and therefore each design may differ slightly making each shirt a unique item and a wearable work of art.

name: I Idolize You CD single
description: Massive Ego -I Idolize You Limited Edition CD single featuring tracks: I Idolize You I Idolize You (LP's Modification mix) I Idolize You (Dirty Solar Nite Mix) I Idolize You (Afterburner Mix) Devil In Disguise Full colour glossy cardboard sleeve featuring exclusive artwork by Chris Von Steiner & full colour factory produced CDr. This CD single comes free with any t-shirt purchase providing audio art and fashion.
